title: Retrospective exhibitions launches new gallery
content:
A NEW gallery and boutique shop, Healey Art & Home, opens in Ledbury with an exhibition of work by artist Ian Jones and a preview event on Tuesday, Septemer 29 from 6pm to 8pm. 
 
Owned and managed by Mark and Wendy Healey, the new venue will be home to antique and contemporary furniture, paintings, sculpture, ceramics, craft and garden wares. 
 
The premiere of Ian Jones retrospective exhibition is the first of many local, national and internationally acclaimed artists Healey Art & Home intend to review. 
 
Ian's retrospective exhibition follows his artistic journey from the late 80s to the present day. Each piece of art has a unique narrative and is visually captivating and challenging. Ian will be present at the opening evening on Tuesday and will also give a short talk about his work and career. 
   
 Share article  
   
"Showcasing Ian's retrospective exhibition is exciting," say Mark and Wendy. "He is a remarkable and talented artist with a unique and vibrant style, who has exhibited nationally and internationally and received numerous awards and prizes throughout his career." 
 
Healey Art & Home is at 36 Homend, Ledbury, open Wednesday to Saturday, 9am to 5pm.
